name: DizzyLazer
description:
W/↑/Shift speeding
A/←/Z turn left
D/→/X turn right
Space/S/Enter shoot laser

orange ships give 1 point
yellow ships give 10 points
purple ships give 50 points

assets used were all CC0
https://kenney.nl/assets/crosshair-pack
https://kenney.nl/assets/simple-space
